summary: Frontend testing complete for Dynasty Spas changes. All requested features verified working correctly: (1) Dynasty listing page has large color options panel in hero, (2) Dynasty product detail pages have NO interactive color selector, just Quick Specs panel, (3) Static 'Available Color Options' reference section at bottom of Dynasty product pages with w-16 h-16 swatches, (4) Grand River swim spas (4 models) displayed on swim spas page, (5) Dynasty swim spas (8 models) displayed on swim spas page, (6) All Dynasty product thumbnails loading (19/19 images), (7) Viking Spa color selector still works with 3-part selector.
passed_tests: Dynasty listing page (/dynasty-spas) - Large color options panel in hero area with 'Acrylic Color Options' and 'Skirt Color Options' headings
Dynasty hero - 4 acrylic colors displayed: Sterling Marble, Storm Clouds, Tuscan Sun, Smoky Mountain with w-14 h-14 swatches
Dynasty hero - 4 skirt colors displayed: Black Confer, Gray Confer, Ash Elite, Coastal Gray Elite with w-14 h-14 swatches
Dynasty product detail page (/products/ds-coconut-bay) - NO interactive color selector (correctly removed via !isDynasty condition)
Dynasty product detail - Quick Specs panel shown on right side
Dynasty product detail - 'Available Color Options' reference section found with data-testid='dynasty-color-reference'
Dynasty reference section - 'Acrylic Color Options' heading with 4 colors (Sterling Marble, Storm Clouds, Tuscan Sun, Smoky Mountain)
Dynasty reference section - 'Skirt Color Options' heading with 4 colors (Black Confer, Gray Confer, Ash Elite, Coastal Gray Elite)
Dynasty reference section - 8 w-16 h-16 color swatches (bigger than hero swatches)
Dynasty thumbnail images - All 19 product images loaded successfully (200 status, naturalHeight > 0)
Dynasty thumbnails - Bay Bliss, High Tide, Twin Palms, Bahama Royale, Imperial Royale images all loaded correctly
Dynasty products count - 19 products displayed on listing page
Grand River swim spas - 'Grand River Spas Swim Spas' section header present on /swim-spas
Grand River swim spas - 4 models found: Valhalla (19 ft), Asgard (15'9"), Odin (14'9"), Thor (13'2")
Dynasty swim spas - 'Dynasty Spas Swim Spas' section header present on /swim-spas
Dynasty swim spas - 8 models found: Family Island Oasis SL, Family Island Oasis, Aquex Party, Aquex Pro, Aquex Pro Plus, 16' Trainer, 17' Pro Plus, 19' Dual Pro
Viking Spas color selector - 'Customize Your Spa Colors' heading found for Viking Heritage product
Viking shell colors - 3 options working: white, silver, opal with clickable buttons
Viking cabinet colors - 4 Elite Series options: slate, chestnut, stone, carbon
Viking corner colors - 2 options: Match Cabinet, Carbon (both clickable)
Viking color selector interactivity - Clicking 'Silver' updates color indicator to 'Silver Satin'
Compare Models feature on Dynasty - Dropdown with 19 options (18 other Dynasty models)
Compare Models - Quick Overview table shows Model, Seats, Jets, Seating, Price, Action columns
Compare Models - 8+ 'View' links in Quick Overview table
critical_code_review_comments: Dynasty color selector correctly removed via !isDynasty condition on line 376 in ProductDetailPage.jsx
Static 'Available Color Options' reference section added with data-testid='dynasty-color-reference' for testability
Color swatches properly sized: w-14 h-14 in hero (DynastySpasPage), w-16 h-16 in reference section (ProductDetailPage)
All image URLs successfully migrated from le-cdn to wixstatic/smushcdn - 19/19 images loading
Grand River swim spas properly added to GRAND_RIVER_SWIM_SPAS array in products.js
Dynasty swim spas properly added to DYNASTY_SWIM_SPAS array in products.js
Viking swim spas array now empty (VIKING_SWIM_SPAS = []) - models moved to Grand River brand
seed_data_creation: N/A - All product data hardcoded in frontend/src/data/products.js
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Dynasty Spas changes verified working: (1) Large color panel in hero on /dynasty-spas with 4 acrylic + 4 skirt colors. (2) NO interactive color selector on Dynasty product pages - replaced with Quick Specs panel and static 'Available Color Options' reference at bottom. (3) All 19 Dynasty product thumbnails loading from wixstatic/smushcdn URLs. (4) Grand River swim spas (4 models: Valhalla, Asgard, Odin, Thor) on /swim-spas. (5) Dynasty swim spas (8 models) on /swim-spas. (6) Viking Spas 3-part color selector still works (shell/cabinet/corner). (7) Compare Models feature working with dropdown and Quick Overview table.
